<h3 id="X5435">X(5435)&nbsp;=&nbsp;2(r + 2R)*X(1) - 3r*X(2) -
4r*X(3)</h3>
Barycentrics&nbsp;&nbsp; (3a - b - c)(a - b + c)(a + b -
c)<br>
<b>X(5435) = 2(r + 2R)*X(1) - 3r*X(2) - 4r*X(3)&nbsp;&nbsp; (Peter
Moses, April 3, 2013)  </b>

<p>X(5435) lies on these lines:
{1, 3523}, {2, 7}, {3, 938}, {4, 5704}, {8, 56}, {10, 3361}, {11, 3474}, {20, 1210}, {21, 1466}, {31, 9364}, {36, 5731}, {40, 9785}, {43, 1458}, {46, 962}, {55, 7677}, {65, 3616}, {77, 2999}, {78, 1467}, {88, 278}, {100, 1617}, {109, 9083}, {140, 3487}, {145, 1420}, {165, 390}, {171, 1471}, {174, 7002}, {175, 5405}, {176, 5393}, {190, 1997}, {208, 4200}, {223, 1443}, {238, 9316}, {241, 2275}, {269, 8051}, {273, 7490}, {279, 3008}, {333, 1014}, {354, 5218}, {376, 5122}, {388, 9780}, {452, 4652}, {479, 658}, {496, 6361}, {497, 1155}, {498, 3337}, {499, 3336}, {516, 5274}, {517, 4345}, {604, 3684}, {614, 4318}, {631, 942}, {651, 1407}, {673, 2898}, {910, 5838}, {912, 6970}, {940, 5933}, {950, 3522}, {978, 1042}, {999, 5657}, {1000, 3654}, {1038, 5262}, {1058, 3579}, {1071, 6927}, {1106, 5247}, {1125, 3339}, {1214, 4850}, {1319, 3241}, {1403, 8299}, {1442, 5256}, {1532, 2096}, {1656, 5714}, {1698, 4298}, {1707, 5121}, {1722, 4320}, {1728, 6953}, {1737, 4293}, {1750, 8544}, {1836, 9779}, {1876, 6353}, {1892, 8889}, {1999, 4460}, {2099, 5298}, {2263, 5272}, {2295, 5228}, {3052, 3756},
{3085, 3338}, {3091, 4292}, {3144, 7103}, {3146, 9581}, {3149, 9799}, {3210, 4552}, {3216, 4306}, {3333, 6684}, {3340, 3622}, {3434, 9352}, {3475, 4860}, {3485, 5221}, {3486, 5204}, {3526, 6147}, {3624, 3671}, {3634, 5290}, {3660, 3873}, {3673, 7397}, {3679, 4315},  {3740, 8581}, {3816, 5698}, {3817, 4312}, {3828, 5726}, {3832, 9579}, {3868, 6921}, {3913, 9797}, {3916, 5084}, {3947, 4355}, {4032, 4699}, {4190, 5175}, {4208, 5705}, {4220, 5807}, {4302, 5131}, {4305, 7280}, {4307, 9746}, {4321, 5686}, {4327, 5268}, {4384, 7176}, {4423, 8543}, {4430, 5083}, {4488, 6557}, {4662, 9850}, {4899, 6555}, {4911, 7402}, {4998, 6632}, {5022, 6554}, {5054, 5719}, {5056, 9612}, {5126, 7967}, {5129, 9843}, {5205, 5423}, {5287, 7269}, {5439, 6857}, {5444, 5902}, {5556, 7173}, {5658, 5729}, {5687, 6764}, {5691, 7319}, {5709, 6926}, {5734, 5903}, {5758, 6891}, {5768, 6905}, {5770, 6911}, {5804, 6906}, {5809, 7580}, {5811, 6944}, {5825, 5927}, {6223, 6848}, {6350, 7011}, {6654, 9358}, {6734, 6904}, {6738, 7987}, {6964, 7330}, {6988, 9940}, {7191, 8270}, {7678, 7965}
</p>
<p>
X(5435) = {X(8),X(56)}-harmonic conjugate of X(4308)</p>
